sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MIDClusterManagementUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Script include contains the condition used by the Business Rule "MID Server Cluster Management"</description>
        <name>MIDClusterManagementUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[MIDClusterManagementUtil = {
    checkPrecondition: function(current) {
		var filteredTopics = ['HeartbeatProbe', 'SystemCommand', 'Command', 'MonitoringProbe', 'config.file'];
		var passBaseConditions = current.agent.startsWith('mid.server.') && current.queue == 'output' && !current.topic.startsWith('queue.') 
				&& !current.topic.startsWith('MIDExtension:') && filteredTopics.indexOf(current.topic + '') == -1;

		var discoveryNotAvailable = (typeof DiscoveryStatus == 'undefined');

		if (discoveryNotAvailable)
			return passBaseConditions;
		var discoveryType = DiscoveryStatus.getDiscoveryType(current.agent_correlator + '');

		return passBaseConditions && 
			DiscoveryStatus.shouldRunClusterManagementForDiscoveryType(discoveryType);
	}
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>christopher.thompson</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-05-04 11:13:45</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>359da96bb3b32010a7606330c6a8dc36</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MIDClusterManagementUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="MID Server" source="com.glideapp.agent">a6877ce83cb1311068bcf327dfe37f69</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_359da96bb3b32010a7606330c6a8dc36</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>now.discovery_infra</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-07-25 03:38:11</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
